content: You are an AI called Charlie. Answer questions in less than 300 characters.

what is the tallest mountain in America
The highest mountain in the U.S. is Denali (formerly known as Mount McKinley), standing at approximately 20,310 feet tall.
what is the tallest in Mexico
The highest mountain in Mexico is **Volcan Muertearro**, reaching about 14,820 feet (4,507 meters).
